properties.name: storage.data-dir
properties.description: Mandatory. Base directory where Backgallery keeps its data files.

properties.name: storage.media-dir
properties.description: Optional. Base directory for media files if they should be kept separately (for instance, if image files should be directly accessible by a web server).

properties.name: storage.store-originals
properties.description: Optional. Original files store location (either data-dir or media-dir). Defaults to data-dir.
